 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חוֺל‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Hos.2.1|Hos 2:1]]</sup> ==sand== (perhaps as turning or ***whirling***; otherwise explained by [[BDB#Sta|Sta]], see below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲוִילָה‎</span>; Late Hebrew ***id.***, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎חָלָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ח‎</span> absolute [[Gen.22.17|Gen 22:17]] + 15 t.; construct [[Gen.32.13|Gen 32:13]] + 6 t.; — ***sand*** [[Exod.2.12|Exod 2:12]] ([[BDB#E|E]]); set as bound for sea [[Jer.5.22|Jer 5:22]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂפֻנֵי טמוני ח‎</span> [[Deut.33.19|Deut 33:19]] ***hidden treasures of sand***, poetic for ***glass*** (regarded as mysteriously produced out of sand, see [[BDB#Di|Di]] and references); 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** usually sand of seashore, simile of numberlessness, vastness, so of Abraham's seed [[Gen.22.17|Gen 22:17]] ([[BDB#J|J]]; compare [[Gen.15.5|Gen 15:5]]); Jacob's [[Gen.32.13|Gen 32:13]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) of a host [[Josh.11.4|Josh 11:4]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), [[Judg.7.12|Judg 7:12]]; [[1Sam.13.5|1Sam 13:5]]; [[2Sam.17.11|2Sam 17:11]] a people [[1Kgs.4.20|1Kgs 4:20]]; [[Hos.2.1|Hos 2:1]]; [[Isa.10.22|Isa 10:22]]; [[Isa.48.19|Isa 48:19]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְצֶאֱצָאֵי מֶעֶיךָ כִּמְעֹתָ֑יו‎</span>), [[Jer.33.22|Jer 33:22]]; [[Hab.1.9|Hab 1:9]] of corn gathered by Joseph [[Gen.41.49|Gen 41:49]] of days of Job [[Job.29.18|Job 29:18]] (on interpretation = ***phoenix***, see [[BDB#Di|Di]]); of birds <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוף כנף‎</span> (i.e. quails) [[Ps.78.27|Ps 78:27]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֶּעָפָר‎</span>); of vast extent of Solomon's wisdom [[1Kgs.5.9|1Kgs 5:9]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** in compare, ***more than the sand*** [[Jer.15.8|Jer 15:8]] (widows of Judah); thoughts of God [[Ps.139.18|Ps 139:18]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** of weight (in balances), metaphor of Job's vexation (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּעַשׂ‎</span>) [[Job.6.3|Job 6:3]] ***heavier than the*** sand, compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנֵטֶל הַחוֺל‎</span> [[Prov.27.3|Prov 27:3]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֹּבֶד‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶבֶן‎</span>), said of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּעַס אֱוִיל‎</span>. — Combinations are: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כח‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אשׁר על שׂפת הים‎</span> [[Gen.22.17|Gen 22:17]]; [[Josh.11.4|Josh 11:4]]; [[1Sam.13.5|1Sam 13:5]]; [[1Kgs.5.9|1Kgs 5:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַיָּם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כח‎</span> [[Gen.32.13|Gen 32:13]]; [[Gen.41.49|Gen 41:49]]; [[Isa.10.22|Isa 10:22]]; [[Hos.2.1|Hos 2:1]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אשׁר לא יִמַּד‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ולא יִסָּפֵר‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַיָּם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ח‎</span> [[Jer.33.22|Jer 33:22]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֶׁעַלשֿׂפת הים לרב‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כח‎</span> [[Judg.7.12|Judg 7:12]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אשׁרעֿלהֿים לרב‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כח‎</span> [[2Sam.17.11|2Sam 17:11]]; [[1Kgs.4.20|1Kgs 4:20]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(מ)חול יַמִּים‎</span> [[Job.6.3|Job 6:3]]; [[Ps.78.27|Ps 78:27]]; [[Jer.15.8|Jer 15:8]].
